scripts.deploy:local: yarn prepare:local && graph deploy coreycaplan3/dolomite-v2 --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy coreycaplan3/dolomite-v2 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy:matic: yarn prepare:matic && graph deploy coreycaplan3/dolomite-v2-matic --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2-mumbai
scripts.deploy:mumbai-local: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy coreycaplan3/dolomite-v2-mumbai --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020/
